posts.post_content:
Next round of T206 detonation. A much harder round for me for sure.  Hate to part with Magie as it was such a quest to get it, but here goes.

Cobb red portrait $2300 PSA 2.5 OBO.  My first card in this journey.  Cobb is SOLD
Magie- $11k  OBO
Both are paypal F and F shipped and insured. First to say I'll take it here wins over ongoing negotiations or pms

Contact me with any questions. Thanks for looking. Eric

Magie-

I've noticed that when I've gotten to selling off my T206 sets it really starts to accelerate quickly!  Enjoy the ride - if done right it can be almost as fun as collecting them in the first place!
That Magie is super nice for the grade.

Thanks for the kind words.  The Magie is a great card. 
 
I could do $sold for the Cobb.  I was looking in the wrong place on VCP and so I was a little high.  My apologies.
Eric
I do have some higher resolution pics on the Magie.  PM me with your email and I can send if interested.
